name: Hoard Hearder
description:
Unleash the Horde!

Try to escape the overrun city while avoiding being bitten by the wandering zombies. Use your torch to scare away the undead as you run through the narrow alleyways. With the city in tarnish you'll need the horde to destroy barricades in your way, rumour has it they love a bit of meat.

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 32 with the theme: An Unconventional Weapon. The game makes use of flocking behaviours to create a believable horde for zombies.


Controls:
Mouse Position: Aim/Look
LMB (Click): Pick Up Item
LMB (Hold): Run Forward
RMB (Click): Open/Close Inventory
LMB (Drag): Use Item
